trans-unit.source: Add missing custom type marshaller members
trans-unit.target: 添加缺少的自定义类型封送程序成员

trans-unit.source: When the 'Managed to Unmanaged with Caller-Allocated Buffer' shape is used by providing a 'FromManaged' method that takes a 'Span<T>' on the marshaller type, the type must provide a static 'BufferSize' property to provide the number of elements in the caller-allocated buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过提供从封送处理程序类型提取“Span<T>”的“FromManaged”方法来使用“Managed to Unmanaged with Caller-Allocated Buffer”形状，则该类型必须提供一个静态的“BufferSize”属性才能提供已分配调用方缓冲。

trans-unit.source: The marshaller type '{0}' must have a static read-only 'int' 'BufferSize' property to specify the size of the caller-allocated buffer because it has a FromManaged method that takes a caller-allocated 'Span<{1}>'
trans-unit.target: 封送处理程序类型“{0}”必须拥有静态的只读“int”“BufferSize”属性，才能指定已分配调用方缓冲的大小，因为它具有提取已分配调用方“Span<{1}>”的 FromManaged 方法

trans-unit.source: The generated 'DllImportAttribute' will not have a value corresponding to '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 生成的 “DllImportAttribute” 将不具有与“{0}”对应的值。

trans-unit.source: '{0}' has no equivalent in 'DllImportAttribute' and will not be forwarded
trans-unit.target: "{0}" 在 "DllImportAtttribute" 中没有等效项，并且将不会被转发

trans-unit.source: Specified 'LibraryImportAttribute' arguments cannot be forwarded to 'DllImportAttribute'
trans-unit.target: 指定的 “LibraryImportAttribute” 参数无法转发到 “DllImportAttribute”

trans-unit.source: Source-generated P/Invokes will ignore any configuration that is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 将忽略任何不受支持的配置。

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持“{0}”配置。如果需要指定配置，请改用常规的“DllImport”。

trans-unit.source: The specified marshalling configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. {0}.
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持指定的封送配置。{0}。

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' configuration for parameter '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持参数“{1}”的指定“{0}”配置。如果需要指定配置，请改用常规的“DllImport”。

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' configuration for the return value of method '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持方法“{1}”返回值的指定“{0}”配置。如果需要指定配置，请改用常规的“DllImport”。

trans-unit.source: The specified value '{0}' for '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified value is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持“{1}”的指定值“{0}”。如果需要指定值，请改用常规的“DllImport”。

trans-unit.source: Specified configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes.
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持指定的配置。

trans-unit.source: Automatically converting a P/Invoke with 'PreserveSig' set to 'false' to a source-generated P/Invoke may produce invalid code
trans-unit.target: 将 “PreserveSig” 设置为 “false” 的 P/Invoke 自动转换为源生成的 P/Invoke 可能会产生无效代码

trans-unit.source: Convert to 'LibraryImport'
trans-unit.target: 转换为 “LibraryImport”

trans-unit.source: Convert to 'LibraryImport' and enable unsafe code
trans-unit.target: Convert to 'LibraryImport' and enable unsafe code

trans-unit.source: Use 'LibraryImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time
trans-unit.target: 使用 “LibraryImportAttribute” 而不是 “DllImportAttribute” 在编译时生成 P/Invoke 封送代码

trans-unit.source: Converting this API to 'LibraryImport' will require additional code to provide custom marshallers for some parameters.
trans-unit.target: Converting this API to 'LibraryImport' will require additional code to provide custom marshallers for some parameters.

trans-unit.source: Mark the method '{0}' with 'LibraryImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time
trans-unit.target: 使用 “LibraryImportAttribute” 而不是 “DllImportAttribute” 标记方法“{0}”，以便在编译时生成 P/Invoke 封送代码

trans-unit.source: Use 'LibraryImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time
trans-unit.target: 使用 “LibraryImportAttribute” 而不是 “DllImportAttribute” 在编译时生成 P/Invoke 封送代码

trans-unit.source: Convert to 'LibraryImport' with '{0}' suffix
trans-unit.target: 转换为带“{0}”后缀的 “LibraryImport”

trans-unit.source: Convert to 'LibraryImport' with '{0}' suffix and enable unsafe code
trans-unit.target: Convert to 'LibraryImport' with '{0}' suffix and enable unsafe code

trans-unit.source: Marshaller type does not have the required shape
trans-unit.target: 封送程序类型没有必需的形状

trans-unit.source: A marshaller for an element scenario cannot be stateful.
trans-unit.target: A marshaller for an element scenario cannot be stateful.

trans-unit.source: The specified marshaller type '{0}' is a stateful marshaller, but stateful marshallers are not allowed in the provided marshal mode '{1}'
trans-unit.target: The specified marshaller type '{0}' is a stateful marshaller, but stateful marshallers are not allowed in the provided marshal mode '{1}'

trans-unit.source: The element type of the span returned by the first method must be the same type as the element type of the span returned by the second method.
trans-unit.target: 第一个方法返回的跨度的元素类型必须与第二个方法返回的跨度的元素类型为相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: The element type of the span returned by '{0}' must be the same type as the element type of the span returned by '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: “{0}”返回的跨度的元素类型必须与“{1}”返回的跨度的元素类型为相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: An entry-point type for marshalling a given type must not be 'null'.
trans-unit.target: 用于封送给定类型的入口点类型不能为“null”。

trans-unit.source: The entry-point marshaller type for the type '{0}' must be not 'null'
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”的入口点封送处理程序类型不能为“null”

trans-unit.source: The first parameter of the first method must be the same type as the return types of the second method.
trans-unit.target: 第一个方法的第一个参数必须与第二个方法的返回类型为相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: The first parameter of '{0}' must be the same type as the return type of '{1}'
trans-unit.target: “{0}”的第一个参数必须与“{1}”的返回类型为相同的类型

trans-unit.source: The first parameters of the two methods must be the same type.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法的第一个参数必须为相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: The first parameter of '{0}' and '{1}' must be the same type
trans-unit.target: “{0}”和“{1}”的第一个参数必须为相同的类型

trans-unit.source: Overloading the 'FromUnmanaged' method is unuspported as some shapes are unable to distinguish between overloads.
trans-unit.target: 不支持重载“FromUnmanaged”方法，因为某些形状无法区分重载。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' overloads the 'FromUnmanaged' method, which is not supported in custom marshallers
trans-unit.target: The type '{0}' overloads the 'FromUnmanaged' method, which is not supported in custom marshallers

trans-unit.source: The return type of 'GetPinnableReference' (after accounting for 'ref') must be blittable.
trans-unit.target: “GetPinnableReference” 的返回类型(考虑到 “ref” 之后)必须是 blittable 的。

trans-unit.source: The dereferenced type of the return type of the 'GetPinnableReference' method must be blittable
trans-unit.target: “GetPinnableReference” 方法的返回类型的取消引用类型必须是 blittable

trans-unit.source: Method '{0}' is contained in a type '{1}' that is not marked 'partial'. P/Invoke source generation will ignore method '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 方法“{0}”包含在未标记为 “partial” 的类型“{1}”中。P/Invoke 源生成将忽略方法“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: Methods marked with 'LibraryImportAttribute' should be 'static', 'partial', and non-generic. P/Invoke source generation will ignore methods that are non-'static', non-'partial', or generic.
trans-unit.target: 标记为 “LibraryImportAttribute” 的方法应为 “static”、“partial” 和非泛型。P/Invoke 源生成将忽略非“static”、“non--partial” 或泛型的方法。

trans-unit.source: Method '{0}' should be 'static', 'partial', and non-generic when marked with 'LibraryImportAttribute'. P/Invoke source generation will ignore method '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 在标记为 “LibraryImportAttribute” 时，方法“{0}”应为 “static”、“partial” 和非泛型。P/Invoke 源生成将忽略方法“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: Invalid 'CustomMarshallerAttribute' usage
trans-unit.target: “CustomMarshallerAttribute”用法无效

trans-unit.source: Invalid 'LibraryImportAttribute' usage
trans-unit.target: “LibraryImportAttribute” 用法无效

trans-unit.source: Specified managed type is invalid
trans-unit.target: 指定的托管类型无效

trans-unit.source: Specified marshaller type is invalid
trans-unit.target: 指定的封送处理程序类型无效

trans-unit.source: Invalid 'NativeMarshallingAttribute' usage
trans-unit.target: “NativeMarshallingAttribute”用法无效

trans-unit.source: Marshaller type has incompatible method signatures
trans-unit.target: 封送程序类型具有不兼容的方法签名

trans-unit.source: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' is invalid.
trans-unit.target: “StringMarshalling” 和 “StringMarshallingCustomType” 的配置无效。

trans-unit.source: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' on method '{0}' is invalid. {1}
trans-unit.target: 方法“{0}”上的 “StringMarshalling” 和 “StringMarshallingCustomType” 的配置无效。{1}
trans-unit.note: {1} is a message containing additional details about what is not valid

trans-unit.source: 'StringMarshallingCustomType' must be specified when 'StringMarshalling' is set to 'StringMarshalling.Custom'.
trans-unit.target: 在 “StringMarshalling” 设置为 “StringMarshalling.Custom” 时，必须指定 “StringMarshallingCustomType”。

trans-unit.source: 'StringMarshalling' should be set to 'StringMarshalling.Custom' when 'StringMarshallingCustomType' is specified.
trans-unit.target: 在指定 “StringMarshallingCustomType” 时，应将 “StringMarshalling” 设置为 “StringMarshalling.Custom”。

trans-unit.source: The element type of the 'ReadOnlySpan' returned by 'GetManagedValuesSource' must be the same as the element type returned by 'GetManagedValuesDestination'.
trans-unit.target: “GetManagedValuesSource” 返回的 “ReadOnlySpan” 的元素类型必须与 “GetManagedValuesDestination” 返回的元素类型相同。

trans-unit.source: The element type of the 'ReadOnlySpan' returned by 'GetManagedValuesSource' must be the same as the element type returned by 'GetManagedValuesDestination'
trans-unit.target: “GetManagedValuesSource” 返回的 “ReadOnlySpan” 的元素类型必须与 “GetManagedValuesDestination” 返回的元素类型相同

trans-unit.source: A 'LinearCollection'-kind native type that supports the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature must provide a three-parameter constructor taking the managed type as the first parameter, a 'Span<byte>' as the second parameter, and the native size of the element as the third parameter
trans-unit.target: 支持 “CallerAllocatedBuffer” 功能的 “LinearCollection” 种类本机类型必须提供一个三参数构造函数，该构造函数将托管类型作为第一个参数、“Span<byte>” 作为第二个参数，并将元素本机大小作为第三个参数

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling with the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature for '{1}' but does not provide a three-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' , a 'Span<byte>', and an 'int'
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持使用 “CallerAllocatedBuffer” 功能对“{1}”进行 “In” 封送，但不提供采用“{1}”、“Span<byte>” 和 “int” 的三参数构造函数

trans-unit.source: A contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesDestination' method that returns a 'Span<>'.
trans-unit.target: 支持从托管到非托管的封送的连续集合封送程序必须提供返回“ReadOnlySpan<>”的“GetManagedValuesSource”和返回“Span<>”的“GetUnmanagedValuesDestination”方法。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesDestination' method that returns a 'Span<>'
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持“{1}”封送模式，但不提供返回“ReadOnlySpan<>”的“GetManagedValuesSource”和返回“Span<>”的“GetUnmanagedValuesDestination”方法

trans-unit.source: A contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes an 'int' and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesSource' method that takes an 'int' and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>'.
trans-unit.target: 支持从非托管封送封送到托管的连续集合封送程序必须提供采用“int”并返回“Span<>”的“GetManagedValuesDestination”和采用“int”并返回“ReadOnlySpan<>”的“GetUnmanagedValuesSource”方法。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes an 'int' and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesSource' method that takes an 'int' and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>'
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持“{1}”封送模式，但不提供采用“int”并返回“Span<>”的“GetManagedValuesDestination”和采用“int”并返回“ReadOnlySpan<>”的“GetUnmanagedValuesSource”方法

trans-unit.source: The marshaller type must be a closed generic or have the same number of generic parameters as the managed type so the generator can determine which methods are available on the specific marshaller types.
trans-unit.target: 封送处理程序类型必须是封闭泛型或具有与托管类型相同的泛型参数，以便生成器可以确定哪些方法可用于特定封送处理程序类型。

trans-unit.source: The managed type '{0}' for entry-point marshaller type '{1}' must be a closed generic type, have the same arity as the managed type if it is a value marshaller, or have one additional generic parameter if it is a collection marshaller.
trans-unit.target: 适用于入口点封送处理程序类型“{1}”的托管类型“{0}”必须是封闭式泛型类型，如果托管类型是值封送处理程序，则该类型必须与托管类型具有相同的 arity；如果托管类型是集合封送处理程序，则它多具有一个泛型参数。

trans-unit.source: The managed type for a custom marshaller must be non-null.
trans-unit.target: 自定义封送处理程序的托管类型必须为非 null。

trans-unit.source: The managed type for the entry-point marshaller type '{0}' must not be 'null'
trans-unit.target: 入口点封送处理程序类型“{0}”的托管类型不能为“null”

trans-unit.source: The marshaller type must be a closed generic or have the same number of generic parameters as the managed type so the emitted code can use a specific instantiation.
trans-unit.target: 封送处理程序类型必须是封闭泛型或具有与托管类型相同数目的泛型参数，以便发出的代码可以使用特定实例化。

trans-unit.source: The marshaller type '{0}' pointed to by the entry-point marshaller type '{1}' must be a closed generic type or have the same arity as the managed type
trans-unit.target: 入口点封送程序类型“{1}”指向的封送程序类型“{0}”必须是闭合泛型类型或与托管类型具有相同的 arity

trans-unit.source: The 'marshallerType' parameter in the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.CustomMarshallerAttribute' cannot be 'null'.
trans-unit.target: “System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.CustomMarshallerAttribute”中的“marshallerType”参数不能为“null”。

trans-unit.source: The 'marshallerType' parameter in the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.CustomMarshallerAttribute' cannot be 'null'
trans-unit.target: “System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.CustomMarshallerAttribute”中的“marshallerType”参数不能为“null”

trans-unit.source: A marshaller type must either be a stateless static class or a stateful value type. A non-static class is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 封送程序类型必须为无状态静态类或有状态值类型。不允许使用非静态类。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' must be a static class or a value type
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”必须为静态类或值类型

trans-unit.source: A type with a 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute' must specify a non-'null' managed type
trans-unit.target: 具有“System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute”的类型必须指定非空的托管类型

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' does not specify a managed type in the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute' applied to the type
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”未在应用于该类型的 “System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute”中指定托管类型

trans-unit.source: The marshaller type must be a closed generic or have the same number of generic parameters as the managed type so the emitted code can use a specific instantiation.
trans-unit.target: 封送处理程序类型必须是封闭泛型或具有与托管类型相同数目的泛型参数，以便发出的代码可以使用特定实例化。

trans-unit.source: The marshaller type '{0}' for managed type '{1}' must be a closed generic type, have the same arity as the managed type if it is a value marshaller, or have one additional generic parameter if it is a collection marshaller.
trans-unit.target: 适用于托管类型“{1}”的封送处理程序类型“{0}”必须是封闭式泛型类型，如果托管类型是值封送处理程序，则该类型必须与托管类型具有相同的 arity；如果托管类型是集合封送处理程序，则它多具有一个泛型参数。

trans-unit.source: LibraryImportAttribute requires unsafe code. Project must be updated with '<AllowUnsafeBlocks>true</AllowUnsafeBlocks>'.
trans-unit.target: LibraryImportAttribute 需要不安全的代码。必须使用 “<AllowUnsafeBlocks>true</AllowUnsafeBlocks>”更新项目。

trans-unit.source: LibraryImportAttribute requires unsafe code. Project must be updated with '<AllowUnsafeBlocks>true</AllowUnsafeBlocks>'.
trans-unit.target: LibraryImportAttribute 需要不安全的代码。必须使用 “<AllowUnsafeBlocks>true</AllowUnsafeBlocks>”更新项目。

trans-unit.source: LibraryImportAttribute requires unsafe code.
trans-unit.target: LibraryImportAttribute 需要不安全的代码。

trans-unit.source: The return type the two method must be the expected type.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法的返回类型必须为预期类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of '{0}' must be '{1}'
trans-unit.target: “{0}”的返回类型必须为“{1}”

trans-unit.source: The return types of the two methods must be the same type.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法的返回类型必须为相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of '{0}' must be the same type as the return type of '{1}'
trans-unit.target: “{0}”的返回类型必须与“{1}”的返回类型为相同的类型

trans-unit.source: A stateful marshaller must have a zero-parameter void-returning instance method named 'Free'.
trans-unit.target: A stateful marshaller must have a zero-parameter void-returning instance method named 'Free'.

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' is a stateful marshaller and does not have a zero-parameter void-returning instance method named 'Free'
trans-unit.target: The type '{0}' is a stateful marshaller and does not have a zero-parameter void-returning instance method named 'Free'

trans-unit.source: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'FromManaged' instance method that takes the managed value as a parameter and returns 'void'.
trans-unit.target: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'FromManaged' instance method that takes the managed value as a parameter and returns 'void'.

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a one-parameter instance method named 'FromManaged' that takes a '{2}' as a parameter and returns 'void'
trans-unit.target: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a one-parameter instance method named 'FromManaged' that takes a '{2}' as a parameter and returns 'void'

trans-unit.source: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'FromUnmanaged' instance method that takes the unmanaged value as a parameter and returns 'void'.
trans-unit.target: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'FromUnmanaged' instance method that takes the unmanaged value as a parameter and returns 'void'.

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a one-parameter instance method named 'FromUnmanaged' that takes the 'unmanaged' value as a parameter and returns 'void'
trans-unit.target: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a one-parameter instance method named 'FromUnmanaged' that takes the 'unmanaged' value as a parameter and returns 'void'

trans-unit.source: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'ToManaged' instance method that takes no parameters and returns the managed type.
trans-unit.target: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'ToManaged' instance method that takes no parameters and returns the managed type.

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a zero-parameter instance method named 'ToManaged' that returns '{2}'
trans-unit.target: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a zero-parameter instance method named 'ToManaged' that returns '{2}'

trans-unit.source: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'ToUnmanaged' instance method that takes no parameters and returns the 'unmanaged' type.
trans-unit.target: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'ToUnmanaged' instance method that takes no parameters and returns the 'unmanaged' type.

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a zero-parameter instance method named 'ToUnmanaged' that returns the 'unmanaged' type for the marshaller
trans-unit.target: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a zero-parameter instance method named 'ToUnmanaged' that returns the 'unmanaged' type for the marshaller

trans-unit.source: When the 'Managed to Unmanaged with Caller-Allocated Buffer' shape is used by providing an 'AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements' method that takes a 'Span<T>' on the marshaller type, the type must provide a static 'BufferSize' property to provide the number of elements in the caller-allocated buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果在封送程序类型上提供采用“Span<T>”的“AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements”方法以使用“通过调用方分配的缓冲区从托管到非托管”形状，则该类型必须提供静态“BufferSize”属性以提供调用方分配的缓冲区中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The marshaller type '{0}' must have a static read-only 'int' 'BufferSize' property to specify the size of the caller-allocated buffer because it has an 'AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements' method that takes a caller-allocated 'Span<{1}>'
trans-unit.target: 封送程序类型“{0}”必须具有静态只读“int”“BufferSize”属性以指定调用方分配的缓冲区的大小，因为它具有采用调用方分配的“Span<{1}>”的“AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements”方法

trans-unit.source: A contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that takes the managed value as a parameter and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesDestination' method that takes the unmanaged value as a parameter and returns a 'Span<>'
trans-unit.target: 支持从托管到非托管的封送的连续集合封送程序必须提供将托管值用作参数并返回“ReadOnlySpan<>”的“GetManagedValuesSource”和将非托管值用作参数并返回“Span<>”的“GetUnmanagedValuesDestination”方法

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that takes '{2}' as a parameter and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesDestination' method that takes the unmanaged value as a parameter and returns a 'Span<>'
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持“{1}”封送模式，但不提供将“{2}”用作参数并返回“ReadOnlySpan<>”的“GetManagedValuesSource 和将非托管值用作参数并返回“Span<>”的“GetUnmanagedValuesDestination”方法

trans-unit.source: A contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes the managed value and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesSource' method that takes the unmanaged value and an 'int' and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>'.
trans-unit.target: 支持从非托管到托管的封送的连续集合封送程序必须提供采用托管值并返回“Span<>”的“GetManagedValuesDestination”以及采用非托管值和“int”并返回“ReadOnlySpan<>”的“GetUnmanagedValuesSource”方法。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes '{2}' and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesSource' method that takes the unmanaged value and an 'int' and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>'
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持“{1}”封送模式，但不提供采用“{2}”并返回“Span<>”的“GetManagedValuesDestination”以及采用非托管值和“int”并返回“ReadOnlySpan<>”的“GetManagedValuesSource”方法

trans-unit.source: A stateless contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide an 'AllocateContainerForManagedElements' method taking the unmanaged type as the first parameter and the number of elements as an 'int' parameter
trans-unit.target: 支持从托管到非托管的封送的无状态连续集合封送程序必须提供将非托管类型用作第一个参数并将元素数用作 “int” 参数的“AllocateContainerForManagedElements” 方法

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but does not provide a two-parameter 'AllocateContainerForManagedElements' method that takes the unmanaged type as the first parameter and an 'int' as the second parameter
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持“{2}”的“{1}”封送模式，但不提供将非托管类型用作第一个参数并将“int”用作第二个参数的双参数“AllocateContainerForManagedElements”方法

trans-unit.source: A stateless contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide an 'AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements' method taking the managed type as the first parameter and providing the number of elements as an 'out int' parameter
trans-unit.target: 支持从托管到非托管的封送的无状态连续集合封送程序必须提供将托管类型用作第一个参数并将元素数作为 “out int” 参数提供的“AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements” 方法

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but does not provide a two-parameter 'AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements' method that takes a '{2}' as the first parameter and an 'out int' as the second parameter
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持“{2}”的“{1}”封送模式，但不提供将“{2}”用作第一个参数并将“out int”用作第二个参数的双参数“AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements”方法

trans-unit.source: A stateless value marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'ConvertToManaged' method that takes the unmanaged type as a parameter and returns the the managed type.
trans-unit.target: 支持从非托管到托管的封送的无状态值封送程序必须提供将非托管类型用作参数并返回托管类型的“ConvertToManaged”方法。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'ConvertToManaged' method that takes the unmanaged type as a parameter and returns '{2}'
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持“{1}”封送模式，但不提供将非托管类型用作参数并返回“{2}”的“ConvertToManaged”方法

trans-unit.source: A stateless value marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a one-parameter 'ConvertToUnmanaged' method that takes the managed value as the parameter and returns a value of the 'unmanaged' type.
trans-unit.target: 支持从托管到非托管的封送的无状态值封送程序必须提供将托管值用作参数并返回“非托管”类型的值的单参数“ConvertToUnmanaged”方法。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but does not provide a one-parameter 'ConvertToUnmanaged' method that takes a '{2}' as a parameter and returns a value of an 'unmanaged' type
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持“{2}”的“{1}”封送模式，但不提供将“{2}”用作参数并返回“非托管”类型的值的单参数“ConvertToUnmanaged”方法

trans-unit.source: The return type of 'ConvertToUnmanaged' and the parameter type of 'ConvertToManaged' must be the same.
trans-unit.target: “ConvertToUnmanaged”的返回类型和“ConvertToManaged”的参数类型必须相同。

trans-unit.source: The return type of 'ConvertToUnmanaged' and the parameter type of 'ConvertToManaged' must be the same
trans-unit.target: “ConvertToUnmanaged”的返回类型和“ConvertToManaged”的参数类型必须相同

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged type for a custom marshaller must be a C# unmanaged type.
trans-unit.target: 自定义封送程序的非托管类型必须为 C# 非托管类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of '{0}' must be unmanaged
trans-unit.target: “{0}”的返回类型必须为非托管

trans-unit.source: 'void*' must be castable to the type so the pinned result of the static 'GetPinnableReference' method can be passed to the native context after being pinned.
trans-unit.target: 必须将“void*”强制转换为类型，这样静态“GetPinnableReference”方法的固定结果才能在固定后传递到本机上下文。

trans-unit.source: 'void*' must be castable to the type '{0}' because the managed type '{1}' has a static 'GetPinnableReference' method
trans-unit.target: “void*”必须可转换为类型“{0}”，因为托管类型“{1}”具有静态“GetPinnableReference”方法

trans-unit.source: An entry-point type for marshalling a given type must have a 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute' that specifies this type as the managed type.
trans-unit.target: 对给定类型进行封送处理的入口点类型必须具有将此类型指定为托管类型的 “System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute”。

trans-unit.source: The entry-point marshaller type '{0}' for the type '{1}' must be a type with at least one 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute' that specifies this type as the managed type
trans-unit.target: 适用于类型“{1}”的入口点封送处理程序类型“{0}”必须是至少具有一个指定此类型为托管类型的 “System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute”的类型

trans-unit.source: A 'Value' or 'LinearCollection'-kind native type that supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction must provide a 'ToManaged' method that returns the managed type.
trans-unit.target: 支持在 “Out” 方向进行封送处理的 “Value” 或 “LinearCollection” 种类的本机类型必须提供返回托管类型的 “ToManaged” 方法。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies it supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction, but it does not provide a 'ToManaged' method that returns the managed type
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持按 “Out” 方向进行封送，但不提供返回托管类型的 “ToManaged” 方法

trans-unit.source: The return type of 'ToUnmanaged' and the parameter type of 'FromUnmanaged' must be the same.
trans-unit.target: “ToUnmanaged”的返回类型和“FromUnmanaged”的参数类型必须相同。

trans-unit.source: The return type of 'ToUnmanaged' and the parameter type of 'FromUnmanaged' must be the same
trans-unit.target: “ToUnmanaged”的返回类型和“FromUnmanaged”的参数类型必须相同

trans-unit.source: For types that are not supported by source-generated P/Invokes, the resulting P/Invoke will rely on the underlying runtime to marshal the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 对于源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持的类型，生成的 P/Invoke 将依赖基础运行时来封送指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. The generated source will not handle marshalling of parameter '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持“{0}”类型。生成的源将不处理参数“{1}”的封送。

trans-unit.source: {0} The generated source will not handle marshalling of parameter '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: {0} 生成的源将不处理参数“{1}”的封送。
trans-unit.note: {0} is a message containing additional details about what is not supported {1} is the name of the parameter

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. The generated source will not handle marshalling of the return value of method '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持“{0}”类型。生成的源将不处理方法“{1}”的返回值的封送。

trans-unit.source: {0} The generated source will not handle marshalling of the return value of method '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: {0} 生成的源将不处理方法“{1}”的返回值的封送。
trans-unit.note: {0} is a message containing additional details about what is not supported {1} is the name of the method

trans-unit.source: Specified type is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes
trans-unit.target: 源生成的 P/Invoke 不支持指定的类型

trans-unit.source: A 'Value'-kind native type that supports the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature must provide a two-parameter constructor taking the managed type and a 'Span' of an 'unmanaged' type as parameters
trans-unit.target: 支持 \"CallerAllocatedBuffer\" 功能的 \"Value\" 种类本机类型必须提供以托管类型和“非管理”类型的 \"Span\" 作为参数的双参数构造函数

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling with the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature for '{1}' but does not provide a two-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' and 'Span' of an 'unmanaged' type as parameters
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持使用“{1}”的 “CallerAllocatedBuffer” 功能进行 “In” 封送，但不提供以“{1}”和“非管理”类型的 “Span” 作为参数的双参数构造函数

trans-unit.source: A 'Value'-kind native type must provide a one-parameter constructor taking the managed type as a parameter
trans-unit.target: “Value” 种类本机类型必须提供一个以托管类型作为参数的单参数构造函数

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling of '{1}' but does not provide a one-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' as a parameter
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”指定它支持“{1}”的 “In” 封送，但不提供将“{1}”作为参数的单参数构造函数
